text: (Narakavacikal, cuvarkka vacikal akiya) ivarkalukkitaiye oru tirai(yana matil) irukkum; atan cikarankalil aneka manitarkal irupparkal; (naraka vacikal, cuvarkka vacikal) ovvoruvaraiyum avarkalutaiya ataiyalankalaik kontu arintu kolvarkal; avarkal cuvarkka vacikalai alaittu"salamun alaikkum (unkal mitu cantiyum camatanamum untakuka!)" Enru kuruvarkal; avarkal innum cuvarkkattil nulaiyavillai - avarkal (atil nulaiya) avalutan irukkinrarkal
